dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, Host_B, have you seen the big news coming out of Kaspi.kz?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, Host B, have you seen the big news coming out of Kaspi dot k z?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I did! The Alipay+ partnership, right? That's, um, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I did! The Alipay plus partnership, right? That's, um, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joint Stock Company Kaspi.kz (Kaspi.kz) (Nasdaq: KSPI), which operates the Kaspi.kz Super App for consumers and Kaspi Pay Super App for merchants, today announces a new partnership with Alipay + to enable Kaspi.kz customers to pay using the Kaspi.kz Super App and QR code, throughout China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It is! So, basically, if you're a Kaspi.kz customer, and you're travelling in China...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is! So, basically, if you're a Kaspi dot k z customer, and you're travelling in China...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] You no longer need to, like, worry about cash or even your card? Just your phone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You no longer need to, like, worry about cash or even your card? Just your phone?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When travelling in China, Kazakhstanis no longer need to take cash or a card with them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! You just use your Kaspi.kz Super App, and you can pay via QR code. We're talking cafes, stores, taxis...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! You just use your Kaspi dot k z Super App, and you can pay via Q R code. We're talking cafes, stores, taxis...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, using the Kaspi.kz Super App, purchases in Chinese stores, cafes, taxis and more than 80 million points throughout China can be paid for by QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. Over eighty million points, I think the article said? That's, uh, massive coverage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Over eighty million points, I think the article said? That's, uh, massive coverage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, using the Kaspi.kz Super App, purchases in Chinese stores, cafes, taxis and more than 80 million points throughout China can be paid for by QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally massive. Mikhail Lomtadze, their CEO, he said they constantly get feedback from Kazakhstanis wanting to pay abroad as easily as at home.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally massive. Mikhail Lomtadze, their C E O, he said they constantly get feedback from Kazakhstanis wanting to pay abroad as easily as at home.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: CEO and Co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail Lomtadze, commented: Many Kazakhstanis work, study and vacation in China. We constantly receive feedback from our customers - how nice it would be to pay for purchases abroad as easily as in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes so much sense, right? Like, who wants to deal with currency exchange when you're on vacation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes so much sense, right? Like, who wants to deal with currency exchange when you're on vacation?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For real. And, uh, Alipay+ is pretty thrilled about it too. Venetia Lee, representing them, mentioned it'll enhance the travel experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For real. And, uh, Alipay plus is pretty thrilled about it too. Venetia Lee, representing them, mentioned it'll enhance the travel experience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Venetia Lee, Greater China General Manager of Ant International, commented: Alipay+ is thrilled to announce our partnership with the first and leading e-wallet Super App in Kazakhstan. ... She added that, While this partnership will enhance the travel and shopping experience for Kaspi.kz users...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for their "mobile-savvy users." So, how does it actually *work* when you're, like, standing at the counter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for their mobile-savvy users. So, how does it actually work when you're, like, standing at the counter?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together we will enable a seamless mobile payment experience in the Chinese mainland for the many Kaspi.kz mobile-savvy users.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's super simple. You open the Kaspi.kz app, select the Alipay+ service, and then either the seller scans your QR code...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's super simple. You open the Kaspi dot k z app, select the Alipay plus service, and then either the seller scans your Q R code...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To pay for purchases, Kaspi.kz customers just need to open the Kaspi.kz app, select the AliPay+ service and let the seller scan their QR code or alternatively buyers can scan the seller's QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...or you scan theirs. Got it. So it's basically the same system many people are used to, just now cross-border.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...or you scan theirs. Got it. So it's basically the same system many people are used to, just now cross-border.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To pay for purchases, Kaspi.kz customers just need to open the Kaspi.kz app, select the AliPay+ service and let the seller scan their QR code or alternatively buyers can scan the seller's QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! It's a huge step for convenience, really aligning with Kaspi.kz's mission to improve lives through mobile products.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! It's a huge step for convenience, really aligning with Kaspi dot k z's mission to improve lives through mobile products.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs mission is to improve peoples lives by developing innovative mobile products and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they've got that whole "two-sided Super App" thing going on for consumers and merchants. It's a smart model.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they've got that whole two-sided Super App thing going on for consumers and merchants. It's a smart model.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To deliver upon this, we operate a unique, two-sided Super App model Kaspi.kz Super App for consumers and Kaspi Pay Super App for merchants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And, um, they've been on the NYSE since early last year, so they're, you know, a pretty established player.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And, um, they've been on the N Y S E since early last year, so they're, you know, a pretty established player.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz has been listed on Nasdaq since January 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, big win for travelers, big win for Kaspi.kz, and a really seamless payment future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, big win for travelers, big win for Kaspi dot k z, and a really seamless payment future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's pretty cool to see.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's pretty cool to see.
